channel.title: Agents on My notes
channel.description: Recent content in Agents on My notes

item.title: Agents Rising: Turning Intelligence into Action
item.description: AI workflow automation company n8n’s $180M series-c funding and OpenAI’s recent announcement of Agent Builder show that industry values the plumbing of intelligence as much as the intelligence itself.

item.title: Agent With MBTI Personality
item.description: Researchers found that enhancing AI agents with MBTI personality can enhance the way agents act and make them more suitable for tasks in various scenarios.
